Hi there! I'm Amira Bayoumi

I’m a coding enthusiast with a background in fiber optics, 5G networks, and telecommunications. Originally from Egypt, I’ve lived in four countries, earning a degree in geophysics and gaining a deep appreciation for diverse cultures. When I’m not coding, I’m exploring my passions for dance, cooking, and art. Now based in Antwerp, Belgium, I’m inspired by its vibrant and welcoming community as I continue my journey in tech.

My Coding Journey

Technology’s ability to reshape our world has fueled my passion for full-stack development. My journey started with curiosity and has grown into a mission to create impactful,user-friendly platforms that empower people to thrive in the digital age.

    Over time, my skills have grown significantly:

  • Front-End Development

    Expert in HTML, native CSS, JavaScript, and DOM manipulation, with React currently in progress.

  • Back-End Development

    Experienced in PHP, Node.js, MySQL, and MongoDB to develop scalable and efficient server-side solutions.

  • Collaboration

    Skilled in using Git/GitHub for seamless version control and teamwork.

  • Project Management

    Well-versed in Agile methodologies, ensuring smooth collaboration and efficient sprint execution.
